message.body: So, now josh wants to come to philly thanksgiving weekend. Are you around???
Yay!!!
Of course!
Wait so you got a new job!!!!???
Yes! Penn is being a bitch with my transcripts though. Apparently I didn't do a loan exit interview, so they aren't releasing my transcripts for proof that I went there
On the phone all day and just kept getting transferred....
That sounds fucking horrible!!! Call me whenever you have a free moment and tell me all about the job! No pressure or rush, but I'm excited for you
It will be fine. I mean I went there, gave them an enormous amount of money and worked my ass off
This will not go unnoticed, even if they end up handing over my transcripts.
And yes, let's catch up. You are so busy, I never know when to call. Should we set a phone date?
Any time tomorrow is totally fine!
Actually any time this week is totally fine! I am putting my show together w Brice but I'm mainly working from home so call whenever!
Ok. Great!
I can't wait to hear about it!
I know I did it. Must have missed one loan...
I vaguelly remember the exit interview myself
* vaguely
That sounds horribly stressful tho and I hope the job works out and things go smoothly from here on out
They aren't helpful in helping me determine which or even that I was missing this!
Thx. Me too. This job and the people sound amazing. They are sooo excited to have me join and after 3 months of interviewing I believe them:)
